Module mark_of_athena
Package com.athena.chapters

Class Chapter4

java.lang.Object
com.athena.bases.Level
com.athena.chapters.Chapter4
All Implemented Interfaces:
iChapterCommands
public class Chapter4 extends Level implements iChapterCommands
Chapter 4 is the final playable chapter in the game Takes in the base level class then uses the chapter commands
Author:
Sophia Feona Cantiller.
